title: Fielding Shredder (HYPERDRIVE, stunt driver, drifter)
description:
Fielding Shredder is a rally instructor and drifter who got a lot of attention last year after his appearance on the Netflix show "Hyperdrive." He had an aggressive driving style and multiple comebacks, making him a crowd favorite. 

Follow him: https://www.instagram.com/shredderracing/?hl=en 

https://www.fieldingshredder.com/sponsors 

https://www.facebook.com/INeedNewTires 

https://www.facebook.com/FieldingShredder/ 

https://rallyready.com/ 

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @shredderracing 

NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst 

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/_Os_dhGmW2M
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
